snippet: Apparently hoping to cast doubt on claims of voter fraud in Sunday's presidential election, Vladimir V. Putin claimed that opponents were plotting to tamper with ballots and blame it on his supporters.
abstract: Apparently hoping to cast doubt on claims of voter fraud in Sunday's presidential election, Vladimir V. Putin claimed that opponents were plotting to tamper with ballots and blame it on his supporters.

byline.original: By GLENN KATES and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Putin Accuses Opponents of Plotting to Tamper With Ballots
